page.title: 01Abbotsley Gazetteer
page.content: The village of Abbotsley is surrounded mainly by arable land.It is along the road from Great Gransden to St Neots It is 16 miles from Bedford, about 15 from Cambridge and 60 from London.St. Neots is nearest market town.The main group of houses are along High Street with modern houses along the south side of the village.The village has a population of about 350 people. Clubs:Abbotsley Society,Cricket Club, Mums And Tots,Parachute,Youth Club. Communication:collection and delivery of post,telephone box. Customs:Feast week. Farming:Arable,Grassland,Woodland Government:Parish Council. Recreational:Golf club,Playing field. Housing:Bungalows,Council Houses, Farmhouses,Old Peoples',Thatched Information:Mobile library Life Styles: Restaurants.
